translation.en: This morning, we set sail for our next grand adventure, the Galapagos,
translation.es: Hoy zarparemos rumbo a nuestra próxima aventura, las Galápagos,

translation.en: and whatever extraordinary creatures await me on these islands.
translation.es: y a las extraordinarias criaturas que me esperan en esas islas.

translation.en: Ooh, uh, Ed? This is embarrassing. Um, but you have a little, um...
- Yeah, right there. You got it. - Uh, I know.
translation.es: - Sí, ahí. Eso es. - Lo sé.

translation.en: - He's fine. - Okay, come on, brother.
The other flummels are waiting for us.
So, we're late. What's the worst thing that could happen?
The countdown to the Flower Festival has begun.
translation.es: Ya casi empieza el Festival de las Flores.
Llegó la hora de la verdad.

translation.en: Now, I know we don't have a lot of flowers, but--
But the ones we got are different, dynamic, and--
Weird. The flowers, you, your brother, all weird.
translation.es: Raras. Las flores, tú, tu hermano, todo raro.

translation.en: That's why no one wants you around.
Well, Ed, we gave it a shot.
It's fine. I don't care what Mali thinks.
translation.es: No me importa qué piense Mali.

translation.en: What are you talking about? You care what everybody thinks.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Te importa lo que todos piensen.

translation.en: Not right now, because I've got a big surprise for you.
translation.es: Ahora no, porque tengo una gran sorpresa para ti.

translation.en: It's an official headdress for my new job.
translation.es: Es un tocado para mi nuevo trabajo.

translation.en: When we all march up the mountain for the Flower Festival, I'll be in one of the most important spots...
translation.es: Al ir a la montaña para el festival, estaré en el lugar más visible.

translation.en: Because I've been chosen to be...
- But the back end? - It's a start.
- No, it's the opposite, it's the finish. - Still, it's an honor.
translation.es: - No, es el final. - Pero es un honor.

translation.en: You know what would make it even better?
but this is my final chance to make a good impression with the rest of the flummels.
translation.es: pero solo me queda esto para agradarles a los demás.

translation.en: And don't take this the wrong way, but, please, just try not to ruin this for me.
translation.es: No lo tomes mal, pero, por favor, trata de no arruinarme esto.

translation.en: Well, whenever you help, things tend to... unravel.
translation.es: Bueno, cuando ayudas, las cosas… salen mal.

translation.en: Waterfall fail, mango avalanche, rock in the hole,
the great fire, the greater fire,
mud for dinner, tree skis, the burpening, fish for hands,
translation.es: comer barro, esquís, eructos, manos de pescado,

translation.en: the ring thing, bee tornado, bee tornado two: the tropical swarm,
translation.es: anillos, tornado de abejas, tornado con enjambre tropical

translation.en: and, of course, Coconut Charlie and the Jackfruit Jam Band.
translation.es: y, por supuesto, Charlie Coco y su banda.

translation.en: So we've had our ups and downs. Mainly downs.
But think of those sweet, sweet occasional ups.
And besides, you need to stop living in the past...
translation.es: Y debes dejar de vivir en el pasado…

translation.en: I just wanted to say, I like that spin move you do.
translation.es: Quería decir que me gusta el giro que haces.

translation.en: Oh, thanks! I call it the Op Pop.
translation.es: ¡Gracias! Lo llamo El giro de Op.

translation.en: - I can teach you, if you want. - You could?
Sure! Just do what I do.
Bo, what have I told you about wandering off?
Fred, looking good. You working out?
- Did you change your fur? - I combed it.
Get ready to give your undivided attention to the roundest guy around,
translation.es: Prepárense para prestar toda su atención al tipo más redondo,

translation.en: the king ring of our hoop troop,
Hey, thank you, Mali. Thanks a bunch, great stuff.
Hey, everybody. All right, a little story just before we begin.
translation.es: Hola. Una historia antes de empezar.

translation.en: Last night, I was doing some thinking, I was doing some math.

translation.es: Y pensé: ¡Oye! Es el centésimo Festival de las Flores.
¡Oye! Es el centésimo Festival de las Flores.

translation.en: That guy gets it. I like that guy.
translation.es: Él sí. Me gusta ese tipo.

translation.en: So anywho, I decided our theme this year,
translation.es: Y decidí nuestra temática de este año.

translation.en: just like every other year, is...
All right. Cheer time is over.
And as always, I, and the Grand Flower Flummel,
translation.es: Y como siempre, la gran floral flummel y yo

translation.en: will lead us right to the top of the mountain to celebrate.
translation.es: los guiaremos a la cima de la montaña para celebrar.

translation.en: big flummels and small flummels, flummels who love the beach,
translation.es: Grandes y pequeños, los que aman la playa,

translation.en: but especially the part where the sand is a little firmer...
translation.es: sobre todo la parte donde la arena es más firme…

translation.en: I told you that branch wouldn't hold us. I don't remember you saying that.
translation.es: - Te dije que la rama no nos soportaría. - No dijiste eso.
No me digan, son los bichos raros.

translation.en: We've been demoted to crab poking.
Well, hey, at least you still have your job as the buddy in the back.
translation.es: Al menos, aún tienes tu trabajo de chico del fondo.

translation.en: you're gonna be asked for a lot of dances.
I get nervous talking to girls that aren't you.
I can't even talk to Vinny since he grew his hair long.
translation.es: Hasta con Vinny, el de pelo largo.

translation.en: Hey, what's-- Looking good. Looking good.
I wanna hear what's been happening.
Hey, Op, I'm coming. Don't you worry. We haven't talked since yesterday.
translation.es: Op, ya voy, descuida. No hablamos desde ayer.

translation.en: So, there's a lot to catch up on.
- First off-- - Uh, he's coming in pretty hot.
Towards the beach. All right, where all the Flummels are working.
translation.es: Hacia la playa. Donde están los flummels.

translation.en: Ah, you're right. Better shoo him off a bit.
translation.es: Sí, mejor lo alejo un poco.

translation.en: But let's be honest, it's all just swimming.
You can't call it a school and expect kids to be excited about it.
translation.es: A los niños no les gusta si le dices escuela.

translation.en: - That's the same thing! - No, that was waving.
- This is a shooing motion. - No, it isn't.
This is a shooing motion! More like this.
translation.es: ¡Esto es para que se aleje! Así.
Y eres una gran modelo, Kim.

translation.en: And guess what? Mr. Seahorse is having a baby!
translation.es: ¡Y el señor Hipocampo tendrá un bebé!

translation.en: - This is shooing motion. - That's what I'm doing.
- No, that's waving. - Drinking sea water makes you go crazy.
translation.es: - No, saludas. - El agua de mar te enloquece.

translation.en: But, really, what else am I supposed to drink?
- That's so waving. Waving. - I'm shooing. Shoo--
I know blubber is just what it's called, but that doesn't make it any less hurtful.
translation.es: Sé que se le dice grasa, pero no por eso duele menos.

translation.en: Oh, oh, save the Grand Flower Flummel!
Were you guys waving or shooing?
Oh, you two really did it this time.
translation.es: Esta vez sí que la hicieron.

translation.en: I really hope Jepson didn't see that.
translation.es: Ojalá Jepson no haya visto eso.

translation.en: You know, I'm patient. Oh, yes, I am.
But sometimes a leader has to lead.
And that is why, Op and Ed,
translation.es: Y, por eso, Op y Ed,

translation.en: you are forbidden from coming to the Flower Festival!
While we go up the mountain,
why don't you two take some time and think about what you did...
translation.es: ¿por qué no van a pensar en lo que hicieron
a la Roca de la Desolación?

translation.en: Oh, that's why it's called that.
And there goes my last chance to belong.
I know this seems bad, but we can--
How do you talk me into these things?
I finally understand why this is called the Forbidden- Don't- Go- Out- There- It's- Way- Too- Dangerous zone.
translation.es: Ya veo por qué se llama la Zona Prohibida y muy Peligrosa.

translation.en: Look, we destroyed all the flowers, right?
So, we're gonna get more flowers no one's ever seen before.
translation.es: Conseguiremos otras que nadie ha visto.

translation.en: They'll have no choice but to forgive us. Now, come on!
It's just a little bit further-- Whoa!
Op! Oh, no. I knew it!
Okay, well...  just making small talk. Looks like rain. No, it doesn't.
translation.es: Bueno… solo charlaba un poco. Parece que lloverá. No.

translation.en: - Oh, and this one. - Easy does it.
Whoa, I've never even seen this flower before.
- I got this.  - That means I get to name it.
- No, I don't have this. - Opadils. No, that's stupid.
You know what? This may actually work.
For sure, this is totally gonna--
- I think I can reach it. - This is my life.
translation.es: - Creo que llego. - Mi vida misma.

translation.en: Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
It is amazing! What do you think it is?
No idea. I've never seen anything like it.
translation.es: Ni idea. Jamás he visto algo así.

translation.en: You think it's some kind of new whale?
Whale? What are you talking about?
- What are you talking about? - What are you talking about?
Op, what are you talking about?
I'm talking about this gorgeous, glowing, swirling--
Ed! Help! Pull me up. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,
- whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa... - Arms tired from poking crabs.
translation.es: Tengo los brazos cansados de pinchar cangrejos.

translation.en: We went into a flower on Flummel Island, then we came out of a flower in this place.
translation.es: Entramos a una flor y salimos en este lugar.

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - Do you know what that means?
No, but it's still pretty wild though.
translation.es: No, pero sigue siendo una locura.

translation.en: Hmm, where are my mid- distance bifocals?
Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Stop.
How did flower picking turn into...
Don't worry. I can fix this.
Op, that mountain you're on is moving.
Oh, hey. Isn't this place great?
We should have never left Desolation Rock.
translation.es: No debimos dejar la Roca de la Desolación.

translation.en: Your ideas have caused us nothing but trouble.
So, we're doing things my way,
translation.es: Haremos las cosas a mi manera.

translation.en: You're the cutest things I've ever seen.
translation.es: Son lo más lindo que he visto.

translation.en: Do you wanna come home and marry my dolly? And you can marry my cat.
translation.es: ¿Quieres venir a casarte con mi muñeca? Y tú, con mi gato.

translation.en: Why do you get the cat?
- It's you again. - Whoa, whoa, whoa! You got it all wrong.
I'm here to help you guys. Sorry for being so rude back at the house.
translation.es: Vine a ayudarlos. Perdón por ser grosero en casa.

translation.en: We dogs are very territorial, you know.
- No. We don't know. - We don't know anything.
Well, let's start with the basics then. I'm Clarance and I'm a dog.
translation.es: Empecemos con lo básico. Soy Clarance y soy un perro.

translation.en: I'm Op and this is Ed and we are--
translation.es: Soy Op y él es Ed, somos…

translation.en: Uh, guys? Wait, wait, no, no. You don't understand. No.
We won't let you die, brother.
Guys, guys, guys, it's just a donut.
I have to admit, we're pretty delicious.
Yeah. I imagine you guys have a few questions.
You should probably ask when are we.
No. We're gonna stick with where are we. Yeah. Where?
Seriously, you should ask when. Seriously.
- No, where. - Yeah, I'm good with where.
Uh, this will take some visual aid.
Oh, I know just the place to get you some answers. Follow me.
I don't know what these are, but I finally feel like we belong to something.
translation.es: No sé qué es esto, pero siento que pertenecemos.

translation.en: Ugh, it makes my skin crawl.
What are we looking at here? We found us's.
And as usual, they're ignoring us.
So, what's going on here? Guys, guys, relax.
This is the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
translation.es: Es el Salón de las Criaturas Extintas.

translation.en: Okay. I mean, the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
translation.es: Digo, el Salón de las Criaturas Extintas.

translation.en: Well, you see it began with-- I guess I could--
translation.es: Bueno, empezó con… Supongo que podría…

translation.en: Oh, you know what, I'll just let this thing do it.
A ship cuts across the sea
That's the thing I saw before we fell into the flower.
translation.es: Eso vi antes de caer en la flor.

translation.en: We are the Beagle of His Majesty's royal fleet.
translation.es: Somos la flota real de su majestad.

translation.en: author of On the Origin of Species.
translation.es: autor de El origen de las especies.

translation.en: Right now, I'm studying the Galapagos
where I've just discovered a previously unknown island.
Unfortunately, the island volcano erupted before they got there.
translation.es: Pero el volcán erupcionó antes de que llegaran.

translation.en: was a single sliver of beach.
That's not even the best part of the beach.
translation.es: Esa no es ni la mejor parte.

translation.en: On the island, Darwin discovered the remains
translation.es: En la isla, Darwin descubrió restos

translation.en: of an unusual ring- shaped animal
translation.es: de un animal en forma de anillo

translation.en: He theorized that the entire flummel species was destroyed by the volcano.
translation.es: Él teorizó que toda la especie fue destruida por el volcán.

translation.en: It doesn't make any sense. Everyone was just fine.
translation.es: ¿Cómo pasó? No tiene sentido. Estaban bien. Estábamos ahí.

translation.en: So, we're in the future in a place called Shanghai.
translation.es: ¿Estamos en el futuro en un lugar llamado Shanghái,

translation.en: And all of the other flummels are... gone?
translation.es: y los flummels ya no existen?

translation.en: No more little Bo. No more that guy whose name we don't know.
translation.es: - Ni Bo. - Ni el del nombre que se te olvidó.

translation.en: Normally, I'd be excited that we just rhymed.
Well, worry a little, but either way, stick with the dog.
translation.es: Bueno, un poco, pero quédense con el perro.
Es Sun, la esposa del Dr. Chung.

translation.en: Really knows how to scratch a tummy.
and used them to travel through time
translation.es: viajó en el tiempo con ellas

translation.en: before he got lost somehow, somewhere.
translation.es: y se perdió en algún lado.

translation.en: Anyway, the answer to all your problems is right through here. So, come on.
translation.es: En fin, la respuesta a sus problemas está por aquí. Vamos.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. I'm not going through that thing again. What if we end up Dr. Chung- ed?
translation.es: No vuelvo a meterme ahí. ¿Y si nos perdemos?

translation.en: Okay. Paws, but front paws, get it?
Thanks to me, Sun hasn't even noticed that Dr. Chung is missing.
translation.es: Gracias a mí, Sun no notó que el Dr. se fue.

translation.en: A place neither in the past nor the future.
translation.es: No está en el pasado ni en el futuro.

translation.en: Dr. Chung discovered that each one of these portals
translation.es: El Dr. Chung descubrió que cada portal

translation.en: leads to a different time flower somewhere in history.
translation.es: lleva a una flor del tiempo distinta.

translation.en: And now he's just showing off.
All we have to do is find the seed that activates the Galapagos portal, and you'll be on your way home.
translation.es: Hay que encontrar la semilla de Galápagos, así podrán ir a casa.

translation.en: No, home before the volcanic explosion,
translation.es: No, antes de la erupción para advertir a todos.

translation.en: - so we can warn everyone. - Warn them?
translation.es: No, antes de la erupción para advertir a todos. ¿Advertirles?

translation.en: How are the flummels gonna trust us with their lives
when they don't even trust us with their flowers?
translation.es: si no nos confían ni sus flores?

translation.en: Remember when I told you look to the future?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que te dije: Mira al futuro?

translation.en: This is that future because we're the only ones
translation.es: Este es ese futuro, somos los únicos que podemos salvarlos de la extinción.

translation.en: who can save the flummels from extinction.
translation.es: somos los únicos que podemos salvarlos de la extinción.

translation.en: We're gonna stand out... as heroes.
But if we're gonna do this, we have to do it right.
- Not this one or this one. Not this one. -
No, actually, I'm doing it all right.
- - I found it! I found the seed for it.
Maybe we're supposed to be extinct.
This is horrible. I got to get out of here. Oh.
I'm Ernest Shackleton, head of the Ernest Shackleton Expedition.
translation.es: Yo soy Ernest Shackleton, jefe de la Expedición Shackleton.

translation.en: Now, don't worry, you're with friends,
part of a team, team Ernest Shackleton.
Hello. I'm Clarance. And you are?
We are all here to serve Master.
translation.es: Estamos aquí para servir al amo.

translation.en: What are you two? Monsters? Space aliens?
We're none of those things. We're Op and Ed, we're--
translation.es: Ninguna de esas cosas. Somos Op y Ed y…

translation.en: They appear to be a pair of flummels, Flummelios Hidella, to be exact.
translation.es: Parecen ser Flummelious Hidelia, para ser exacta.

translation.en: The Germans refer to them as...
They all went extinct in the early 19th century.
translation.es: Se extinguieron en el siglo XIX.

translation.en: My anxious friend here is Burnie, and he's a Tasmanian tiger,
translation.es: Mi amigo es Burnie, un tigre de Tasmania,

translation.en: and Alma is a meridian gelada.
They're new and small and new.
And this is Hoss. He's from the Cretaceous Period.
translation.es: Y él es Hoss. Es del Cretácico,

translation.en: So, he's millions of years old, but also he's only five.
translation.es: tiene millones de años y también solo cinco.

translation.en: We'd be happy to tell you all about everything.
We have a nice glossy brochure or...
translation.es: Podemos darles un lindo folleto o…

translation.en: So you're wondering what it means To be an extinctable
translation.es: Así que te preguntas qué significa ser un extinguible.

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid the answer Starts with the unthinkable
translation.es: Bueno, me temo que la respuesta empieza con lo impensable.

translation.en: But lucky for us Dr. Chung arrived
He brought us here Where it's safe and warm And sheltered us from major storm
translation.es: Aquí nos albergó y de una tormenta nos salvó.

translation.en: - I think she means extinction. - Probably.
Now we call this strange place home
And honestly prefer not to roam
We know staying here Feels like a crime
translation.es: Quedarnos aquí es casi un delito.

translation.en: When we could explore anyplace in time Like 4 BC or NYC
translation.es: Podríamos ir a Nueva York o al año 4 antes de Cristo.

translation.en: Maybe visit Pompeii Before it went to rubble
Nope This place is not worth the trouble
But the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.es: El mundo es peligroso y justicia no hay.

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.es: Puedes matar el tiempo aquí, o el tiempo te matará allá.

translation.en: There's plague and famine Germs by the pound
Virus and disease No cure to be found
There's wars and swords And tyrants abound
translation.es: Hay tiranos y guerras muy duras.

translation.en: Aliens, Bigfoot The Earth isn't round Burnie.
translation.es: - Aliens, Pie Grande, Tierra plana. - Burnie…

translation.en: Get crushed, blown up Or fall deathly ill
translation.es: Puedes ser aplastado, explotar o morir.
donde el reloj no tiene fin.

translation.en: For the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.es: El mundo es peligroso y justicia no hay.

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.es: Puedes matar el tiempo aquí, o el tiempo te matará allá.

translation.en: The bulldog rat, the Aztec cat
translation.es: La rata bulldog, el gato azteca.

translation.en: Giant goose and the great stag moose
translation.es: El ganso gigante y el gran alce.

translation.en: The large sloth lemur The Pleistocene beaver
translation.es: El lémur perezoso o el castoroide.

translation.en: The Russian retriever Guys, I wish you could've seen it
'Cause no matter the name They're all out of the game
It's a Japanese sea lion crying shame
translation.es: Una pena por el león japonés.

translation.en: It could happen any year In any hemisphere
If you wanna stay safe Best stay right here
For the world's full of danger
You can kill time here or
Time can kill you out there
translation.es: o el tiempo te matará allá.

translation.en: You know, I feel Clarance would've really gotten a kick out of that.
translation.es: Creo que a Clarance le habría encantado.

translation.en: Uh, the portals just went crazy
and... and then Clarance flew away...
translation.es: Los portales enloquecieron y Clarance salió volando.

translation.en: This is a new record, Op.
We've been here all of ten minutes, and everybody already hates us.
translation.es: Diez minutos y ya nos odian todos.

translation.en: Oh, hate is a strong word.
It's fine. It'll all be fine.
Ed and I will get Clarance and the seed back.
translation.es: Traeremos a Clarance y la semilla.

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but there's no telling where or when Clarance might be.
translation.es: Perdón, pero no saben dónde ni cuándo está Clarance.

translation.en: Not to mention, he may be taken by body snatchers,

translation.es: o del coco o un cíclope.

translation.en: Burnie. The point is, Clarance could be anywhere, literally.
translation.es: Burnie… Clarance podría estar en cualquier parte.

translation.en: Doesn't he have to be in one of those places?
translation.es: ¿No sería en uno de esos lugares?

translation.en: You're suggesting you randomly journey to these dozens of unknown and dangerous places
translation.es: ¿Sugieres un viaje a lugares desconocidos y peligrosos

translation.en: in hopes of stumbling across Clarance by sheer dumb luck?
Sounds like a plan to me.
- Let's go find that dog. - Wait.
Did she say dangerous? Did you say dangerous?
Dangerous is just another word for heroic.
translation.es: Peligroso es lo mismo que heroico.

translation.en: Hello, sir. Have you seen a cute little doggy around here?
translation.es: Señor, ¿vio un lindo perrito por aquí?

translation.en: No sign of Clarance, and we almost got killed.
translation.es: Nada de Clarance, y casi nos matan.

translation.en: This is why I don't like to travel.
Come on, Ed. We've got a lot more places to check,
Hi, me. Oh, no. There's a hole right through me.
Just messing. I know that's how I look.
translation.es: Bromeo. Sé que así me veo.

translation.en: Bound to be the eventual death of me? I was going to say energetic.
translation.es: - ¿Por matarme? - Iba a decir llena de energía.

translation.en: Okay, Ed. I've got a great feeling about this next portal.
translation.es: Tengo un gran presentimiento con este.

translation.en: That lady really didn't like us trying on her hat.
translation.es: No le gustó que nos probemos su sombrero.

translation.en: History must be a non- stop adventure.
translation.es: La historia es toda una aventura.

translation.en: Each place is more exciting than the last.
translation.es: Un lugar más emocionante que otro.

translation.en: you do not want to leave here where it's safe.
translation.es: no quieres irte de aquí, un lugar seguro.

translation.en: And Op, he's just a kid.
translation.es: Y Op, Hoss es solo un niño.

translation.en: You should stop putting ideas in his head.
But I want ideas in my head.
translation.es: Pero quiero que me den ideas.

translation.en: I'm so cooped up in here.
I know what will knock the glum right outta ya.
Live from inside Dr. Chung's mobile greenhouse,
translation.es: Desde el invernadero móvil del doctor Chung,

translation.en: it's Burnie, the Down- Under- Wonder.
First, I'll need a common household item.
Now, I place the object between the two Time Flowers
translation.es: Ahora pongo el objeto entre las dos flores del tiempo

translation.en: Where'd it go? Where'd it go?
It'll be back in three, two, one, and...
translation.es: Volverá en tres, dos, uno y…

translation.en: A magician never reveals his secrets.
translation.es: Un mago nunca revela sus trucos.

translation.en: The merging of two Time Flowers
causes an extremely powerful arc that disassembles the atoms of an item,
translation.es: crea un arco que desvía los átomos de un objeto

translation.en: sends them into a time loop,
then reassembles the item at a different point in time.
translation.es: y lo rearma en otro momento.

translation.en: All we do, we do for Master.
translation.es: Todo lo hacemos por el amo.

translation.en: Well, uh, I think I heard Master say
translation.es: Bueno, creo que escuché al amo decir

translation.en: you two should snap my leash so I can go free.
This did not go how I hoped.
Whoa! But I do see a pretty good wall.
On second thought, a great wall.
Imagine if we brought these back to the flummels.
We have a lot of mess ahead of us, and you keep making the mess messier.
translation.es: Tenemos un lío por delante y tú sigues empeorándolo.

translation.en: You just don't think things through.
translation.es: Solo no piensas bien las cosas.

translation.en: I mean, we've been lucky so far,
but one of these days, you're gonna get someone hurt,
translation.es: pero un día lastimarás a alguien.

translation.en: From now on, we don't do anything unless we're both onboard.
translation.es: No haremos nada más a menos que lo acordemos.

translation.en: It's been a while. You do think they're okay out there?
translation.es: Ya pasó un rato. ¿Creen que estén bien?

translation.en: Barely. Those sky flowers tried to kill us.
translation.es: De milagro. Esas flores casi nos matan.

translation.en: These are fireworks. The Chinese invented them.
They also invented the gunpowder inside them.
They came from the Qianlong Coronation.
translation.es: Vienen de la coronación de Qianlong.
Deben haber estado en China en 1736.

translation.en: So... where you two going next?
If that's the one you want, then I love it.
translation.es: Si tú quieres esa, me encantaría.

translation.en: Let's hope it's the right one, for the flummels' sake.
translation.es: Ojalá sea la que salve a los flummels.

translation.en: They have no idea our entire species is doomed.
translation.es: No saben que nuestra especie está perdida.

translation.en: I can't believe you guys found me.
You're better explorers than this Shackleton guy.
Oh, you'll be happy to know I kept this safe.
translation.es: Les alegrará saber que mantuve esto a salvo.

translation.en: - Good. What's the plan? - Yeah. What's the plan?
No, no, no. She wouldn't abandon us. We just talked about this.
translation.es: Jamás lo haría. Acabamos de hablar de esto.

translation.en: And Op just promised me that she wouldn't do this kind of thing anymore.
translation.es: Me prometió que ya no haría estas cosas.

translation.en: She'll be back. She's probably just gonna just--
Okay. She might have abandoned us.
Op runs off, and I'm left pounding a rock.
translation.es: Op se va y yo golpeo una roca.

translation.en: Hoss, see that shiny necklace on Clarance?
We can't get home without that seed. Hoss, circle back around.
translation.es: No volveremos sin ella. Hoss, regresa.

translation.en: Back into the Time Flower, Hoss, and step on it.
translation.es: A la flor del tiempo, Hoss. Rápido.

translation.en: Do you know how to play this game?
Hey, have you guys seen Hoss?
You almost got him extinct. Not to mention the rest of us.
translation.es: Casi lo extingues. Y a todos nosotros.

translation.en: That's right, you didn't think, and you didn't listen.
translation.es: Así es, no pensaste y no escuchaste.

translation.en: Even though you looked me in the eye
translation.es: Por más que me miraste a los ojos

translation.en: and promised me that you wouldn't do anything unless we were both onboard.
translation.es: y me prometiste que no harías nada sin acordarlo.

translation.en: All this time I thought I never fit in with the flummels because there was something wrong with me.
translation.es: Creía que no encajaba porque había algo mal en mí.

translation.en: I'm saying that my life would be better off without you!
translation.es: ¡Digo que mi vida estaría mejor sin ti!

translation.en: I'm sure he just needs some time to cool off.
And he is better off without me.
But there's one thing I can still do.
- I'm going back to warn the flummels. - Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa.
I'm not sure you should go without Ed.
translation.es: No sé si debas ir sin Ed.

translation.en: I'd just end up causing him more trouble, and I've caused him enough trouble already.
translation.es: Le causaría más problemas, y ya le causé suficientes.

translation.en: If I can pull this off, then Ed will have a community to go home to.
translation.es: Si lo logro, tendrá una comunidad al volver.

translation.en: at least I can't hurt him again.
You know, you're also a great leader on the dance floor.
translation.es: También eres un gran líder en la pista.

translation.en: You've said that about five times already.
translation.es: Ya lo dijiste unas cinco veces.

translation.en: little reminder, this is the Flower Festival.
translation.es: Primero, este es el Festival de las Flores.

translation.en: Second reminder, you've been banned from the Flower Festival.
translation.es: Segundo, estás vetada del Festival de las Flores.

translation.en: I don't have time for the whole story, but I need everyone's attention.
translation.es: No tengo tiempo para todo, necesito su atención.

translation.en: I am trying to get my kids to sleep in here.
translation.es: Estoy intentando dormir a mis hijos.

translation.en: - - Oh, now, I'm up all night.
translation.es: No dormiré en toda la noche.

translation.en: I just returned from the future. and I learned that in the past,
translation.es: Acabo de regresar del futuro y sé que en el pasado,

translation.en: and by the past I mean now,
our entire species is about to stop existing.
translation.es: toda nuestra especie deja de existir.

translation.en: So, if we're going to live to see the future,
we have to do something now,
We're all about to go extinct.
Everyone, I promise you. Op, you're being ridiculous.
translation.es: Lo prometo. Op, estás siendo ridícula.

translation.en: That's why I made this face because you're ridiculous.
translation.es: Por eso esta cara. Eres ridícula.

translation.en: I'm telling you, it's true. I-- I swear on this conch.
translation.es: Es la verdad. Lo juro por esta caracola.

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't drag me into this.
Look, here's proof I was in the future.
- Why did I think this would work? -
Wow, you really let her have it.
Remind me to never get on your bad side.
But don't you think you were maybe a little bit hard on her?
translation.es: Pero ¿no crees que fuiste un poco duro con ella?

translation.en: She is your sister after all.
translation.es: Después de todo, es tu hermana.

translation.en: No. It's been like this our whole lives.
translation.es: No. Ha sido así toda la vida.

translation.en: Maybe I shouldn't have said it out loud,
translation.es: Quizá no debí decirlo en voz alta,

translation.en: My life would be much better without her.
translation.es: Mi vida sería mucho mejor sin ella.

translation.en: This is a place of withouts.
We all live here without our families, without friends.
translation.es: Todos vivimos sin nuestras familias, sin amigos.

translation.en: Sometimes, I think, without really living at all.
translation.es: A veces, creo que casi no vivimos.

translation.en: But I can tell you this,
life is really tough when you're all by yourself.
translation.es: La vida es muy dura si estás solo.

translation.en: ...messing. I know that's how I look.
translation.es: Bromeo. Sé que así me veo.

translation.en: Hey, Ed. Ed, are you seeing this?
Could someone give me a hand with this?
Hey, check it out, I'm the friend at the end.
translation.es: Oigan, miren, soy el amigo del fondo.

translation.en: Hey, Wally, get over here, buddy.
I have to talk to Op.
I wanted to ask Op if she'd sign it, too,
but she left in kind of a hurry.
I think she said something about going home.
translation.es: Creo que dijo algo sobre volver a casa.

translation.en: Gave us a lot to think about.
But let's be honest, truthful, real truthful,
you never went to the future.
And I can attest to it.
translation.es: Y yo puedo dar fe de ello.

translation.en: I don't know, but sick do.
translation.es: No sé, pero qué buen pelaje.

translation.en: I'm a dog, part poodle, part-- it's hard to know. My mother was very social.
translation.es: Soy un perro, mitad caniche, mitad… No sé, mamá era muy sociable.

translation.en: You came! You've gotta tell the flummels they're in trouble.
Oh, they most certainly are in trouble...
Hey, wait! Where are you going?
Okay. So, she might have been telling the truth.
translation.es: Bueno, tal vez sí haya dicho la verdad.

translation.en: And why did you do this?
Hate, hate, hate, hate, hate hate, hate! Flummels ruined my life!
I was a puppy once, adorable and spunky,
translation.es: Yo era un cachorro adorable y valiente

translation.en: just waiting for a family to take me home.
translation.es: que esperaba una familia y un hogar.

translation.en: But unfortunately, I lived in a world of flummels.
translation.es: Pero vivía en un mundo de flummels.

translation.en: And flummels were the most popular pet in the world.
translation.es: Y los flummels eran la mascota más popular del mundo.

translation.en: I get it. Nobody wanted a dog with a stomach.
translation.es: Lo entiendo. Nadie quería un perro con estómago.

translation.en: But then, one day, my luck changed.
translation.es: Pero un día, mi suerte cambió.

translation.en: I couldn't believe it. This man wanted me.
translation.es: No podía creerlo. Ese hombre me quería.

translation.en: And he even loved me enough to give me a name.
translation.es: Me quería tanto que me puso un nombre.

translation.en: You're coming home with me, Clarance.
I was expecting a warm bed, and a fresh pile of newspapers.
translation.es: Esperaba una cama caliente y periódicos.

translation.en: - I got something better. - Good boy.
translation.es: Pero recibí algo mejor. Buen chico.

translation.en: It was then that I realized I was more than just a pet.
translation.es: Y entendí que era más que una mascota.

translation.en: I was a part of science.
It's the top of the fifth inning as the Bambino steps to the plate.
translation.es: Quinta entrada, el Bambino al bate.

translation.en: He's pointing to a dog on a tiny little car.
translation.es: Señala a un perro en un autito.

translation.en: Oh, Doctor, I don't believe it.
I finally felt I belonged somewhere,
adventuring through time and history together.
translation.es: viajando por el tiempo y la historia.

translation.en: But then, one day, we traveled to 1835,
And there we found a bunch of these stupid napkin rings.
translation.es: Y hallamos a varios de ustedes, anillos estúpidos.

translation.en: Dr. Chung told me this was when Darwin first discovered flummels
translation.es: El doctor Chung dijo que fue cuando Darwin descubrió

translation.en: and introduced them to the rest of the world.
translation.es: a los flummels y los presentó al mundo.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness, look at you.
He was gonna love flummels more than me.
translation.es: Los querría más que a mí.

translation.en: And then it hit me. I didn't have to accept the course of history.
translation.es: Y ahí supe que no tenía que aceptar la historia.

translation.en: Ready for our next adventure, Clarance?
Yeah, that's right. I turned on my master.
translation.es: Sí, así es. Me volví contra mi amo.

translation.en: I pushed him though a portal and made sure he could never come back.
translation.es: Lo empujé a través de un portal y me aseguré de que nunca volviera.

translation.en: After that, there was nothing stopping me from coming back here
translation.es: Después de eso, nada me impidió volver aquí

translation.en: Now, back to some smooth jazz.
It was a quick trip, but I got a lot done that day.
translation.es: Fue un viaje rápido, pero hice mucho.

translation.en: And it was all a done deal until you two hula- hoops showed up.
translation.es: Y todo iba bien hasta que aparecieron ustedes dos.

translation.en: But it's all about to be fixed,
because your brother is back with the other cowards
translation.es: Tu hermano está con los cobardes

translation.en: who never leave their precious, little Time Terminal.
translation.es: que no dejan su terminal del tiempo.

translation.en: And you're not getting off this island alive.
translation.es: Y tú no saldrás viva de aquí.

translation.en: That's more time than I thought. I mean it's not a lot of time but--
translation.es: Más de lo que creí. No mucho, pero…

translation.en: Yeah. I meant to only set it for three.
You know what, it don't matter.
You've got a front row seat to your species'
She's too funny to stay mad at.
I just returned with the last Tasmanian tiger on Earth.
translation.es: Volví con el último tigre de Tasmania de la Tierra.

translation.en: It scratched me up pretty good.
What? I don't get into cars with strangers.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No me meto en autos con extraños.

translation.en: That's the day he went missing.
Today, I'm visiting one of my heroes,
translation.es: Visitaré a uno de mis héroes,

translation.en: He created one of the first nautical maps ever.
translation.es: Creó uno de los primeros mapas náuticos.

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe I'll even get to see him drawing it up.
translation.es: Quizá hasta pueda ver cómo lo dibuja.

translation.en: We know where he went now.
Ready for your next adventure, Clarance?
What kind of conspiracy nut am I if I didn't see that coming?
But we could still save Dr. Chung if we just use whatever seeds...
translation.es: Pero podríamos salvarlo con la semilla…

translation.en: Oh, I can't believe we finally know where Dr. Chung is, and there's no way to bring him back.
translation.es: No puedo creer que sepamos dónde está y no podamos traerlo de vuelta.

translation.en: No, no. Dr. Chung said he was going to 1417, remember?
translation.es: No, el Dr. Chung dijo que iba a 1417, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: which means he probably joined his expedition to Malacca, 1418,
translation.es: Y probablemente se unió a su expedición a Malaca. 1418.
Ahí hay otra flor del tiempo.

translation.en: We just need some sort of beacon to lead him to it.
We should also give him the brochure.
I'm so sorry, I didn't mean...
A volcano didn't make us extinct.
and now he's trapped the others in the cave,
translation.es: Y atrapó a todos en la cueva

translation.en: and he trapped me against this tree and...
translation.es: y a mí en este árbol, y…

translation.en: because we both didn't agree that it is.
I was so wrong to say what I said,
translation.es: Me equivoqué con lo que dije,

translation.en: and I want you to know that I didn't mean it.
translation.es: y debes saber que no fue en serio.

translation.en: All you've ever done is support me,
and my life would be nothing without you.
translation.es: Mi vida no sería nada sin ti.

translation.en: What are you talking about? I can't do anything right.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? No puedo hacer nada bien.

translation.en: You know it. I know it, the rest of the flummels certainly know it and--
translation.es: Tú, yo y todos los flummels lo sabemos y…

translation.en: Who cares what the flummels think?
I've spent so long worried about fitting in with all the other flummels
translation.es: Pasé tanto tiempo preocupándome por encajar con el resto

translation.en: that I never even noticed this is where I fit in best.
translation.es: que nunca vi que estoy donde encajo mejor.

translation.en: Come on, I screw up all the time.
translation.es: Arruino las cosas todo el tiempo.

translation.en: But if it weren't for your screw- ups,
then we would've never even fallen through that flower.
translation.es: nunca habríamos caído en esa flor.

translation.en: we have a chance to rescue our species from extinction.
translation.es: podemos salvar a nuestra especie de la extinción.

translation.en: because they'd do the same thing for us if it were the other way around.
translation.es: porque ellos harían lo mismo por nosotros.

translation.en: You think you can get me out of this thing?
No problem. There's only a million combinations here.
translation.es: Sí. Solo son un millón de combinaciones.

translation.en: Next time I poke you, it's gonna be a lot softer.
Come on, Op, we're not gonna let that adorable maniac get away with this.
translation.es: Vamos, ese adorable loco no se saldrá con la suya.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. It can't be.
translation.es: No. ¡No puede ser! PARA PERROS PARA FLUMMELS

translation.en: - Why won't these flummels just die? -
Looks like I may need some help.
How much time before the bomb goes off?
I know it wants to kill us
but you have to admit, it is helpful.
Don't worry. You'll be long gone by then.
translation.es: No se preocupen. Ya no existirán.

translation.en: What are you gonna do, fuzzball?
There's only one you and two us's.
translation.es: Eres uno y nosotros somos dos.

translation.en: And in case you were wondering if ancient Greek monsters are real,
translation.es: Si se preguntaban por los monstruos griegos,

translation.en: Okay, Greg, you know what to do.
I just drove for the first time and so far, I've only hit one pedestrian.
translation.es: Conduje por primera vez y solo choqué a un peatón.

translation.en: The best decision I've made in a long time.
translation.es: Mi mejor decisión en mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Crikey, that one eye makes for pretty poor depth perception.
translation.es: Ese ojo no percibe bien la profundidad.

translation.en: He couldn't hit the broadside of a Hoss.
translation.es: No pudo darle ni a Hoss.

translation.en: Hey, Cyclops, bet you can't hit me. - Bet you can't hit me. - Hmm?
translation.es: Oye, cíclope, apuesto a que no puedes darme.

translation.en: Need a target? Hundred points if you get it through the bull's- eye.
translation.es: Oye, cien puntos si me atraviesas.

translation.en: - Hey, put some sauce on that meatball. -
translation.es: Oye, ponle salsa a esa albóndiga. ¡Vamos, idiota! ¡Vamos, amigo!

translation.en: No! Stop, you one- eyed idiot!
He is a very, very, very ugly wet- looking dog.
translation.es: Es un perro muy feo y muy mojado.

translation.en: So, I spent a lot of my cave time thinking about you two,
translation.es: Bien, pasé mucho tiempo en la cueva pensando en ustedes

translation.en: and what I would do if we ever got out of there alive.
translation.es: y en lo que haría si salíamos con vida.

translation.en: You think maybe we could do this later?
The whole island is about to blow up.
Wh-- what do we do, Jepson?
The only thing we can do.
and then we do whatever they say.
translation.es: y hacer lo que nos digan.
Es el barco de Charles Darwin.

translation.en: the man from the museum movie.
If we make it to the beach, he might be able to save us.
Wait, I know what that means, and it's good.
Is something wrong with them? They don't have any holes.
Jepson, you get everyone to the beach.
We'll meet you there after we get Darwin's attention with the sky flowers.
translation.es: Haremos que Darwin vea las flores del cielo.

translation.en: Uh, but these flummels haven't been sanitized.
No time, just go. Hi- yah.
Wait. I just wanna say thanks for everything,
and try not to fall to your death.
What do you think I am, a dodo?
Oh, because they look like flowers in the sky.
translation.es: Claro, parecen flores en el cielo.

translation.en: Hey, tell whoever came up with that name, great job.
Can we go? Please, please, please, please, please?
Fine. But this is the last island.
translation.es: Bueno. Pero esta es la última isla.

translation.en: He sees us! Op and Ed did it!
Whoa, that felt weird to say.
Ah, now, that's the Op and Ed I know.
translation.es: Eso es más propio de Op y Ed.

translation.en: Yeah, who'd have thought our aim would be too good?
You don't wanna eat us. Just eat me. Let Ed live.
translation.es: Cómeme solo a mí. Deja que Ed viva.

translation.en: - Hmm? - That's nice what you said out there, you know, outside of the mouth.
translation.es: Fue lindo lo que dijiste ahí afuera.

translation.en: I hope he swallows me first just so you can live a little longer.
translation.es: Ojalá me trague antes, así vivirás más.

translation.en: I hope he swallows me first.
I don't wanna see you swallowed.
We're alive and smell like Cyclops's breath.
translation.es: ¡Estamos vivos! Y olemos a aliento de cíclope.

translation.en: Behind that big eye is an even bigger heart.
translation.es: Tiene un gran ojo y un gran corazón.

translation.en: And by the way, you have a cavity.
Op, I don't think that ship is gonna get here in time to save us.
translation.es: Op, no creo que lleguen a tiempo para salvarnos.

translation.en: So the Cyclops will throw us to the Time Flower,
translation.es: El cíclope nos arroja a la flor,

translation.en: we'll take it to the beach, and we'll take everyone through it before the bomb goes off.
translation.es: vamos a la playa y huimos todos antes de la explosión.

translation.en: Hey, you can do it, big guy. We believe in you.
translation.es: Tú puedes, grandote. Creemos en ti.

translation.en: Nice aim, Greg. You're a natural.
If I didn't know any better,
I'd say these creatures are trying to communicate with us.
Perhaps they're adapting to the changes around them in order to survive.
translation.es: Quizá se estén adaptando para sobrevivir.

translation.en: Almost as if they're, I don't know, evolving or something.
translation.es: Como si estuvieran evolucionando o algo.

translation.en: and there's only gonna be one survivor, and that's me.
translation.es: y solo habrá un sobreviviente, y seré yo.

translation.en: So, hand over that Time Flower.
- Nice Op Hop. - I learned from the best.
Dang, I always forget about this cliff.
I might have one, and it's kind of an Op idea.
translation.es: Tal vez yo sí. Lo que Op haría.

translation.en: You almost got us killed, Ed.
Is this how I make you feel all the time?
- Pretty much. - I am so sorry.
Time Flowers. How many times did you hit your head on the way down?
translation.es: ¿Las flores…? ¿Cuántas veces te golpeaste la cabeza?

translation.en: Okay. Great. Now we have three Time Flowers.
Something other than lighting a boat on fire.
- Do you think this will work? - I have no idea.
I got to get this bomb away from me.
my great- great- grandfather sailed here with the one and only Charles Darwin.
translation.es: mi tatarabuelo navegó aquí con Charles Darwin.

translation.en: He claimed that there was an island here that exploded and completely vanished.
translation.es: Afirmaba que había una isla que explotó y desapareció.

translation.en: Yeah. I think I had a relative that did something like that, too.
translation.es: Creo que tuve un pariente que también hizo algo así.

translation.en: Oh, or at least I'm alive.
translation.es: O al menos yo estoy viva.

translation.en: Oh! Hoss and everybody, you're alive!
Yes, thanks to Op and Ed,
translation.es: Sí, gracias a Op y Ed,

translation.en: So... were you worried about me?
Burnie's trick on a grand scale. We used every Time Flower we could find
translation.es: El truco de Burnie a gran escala. Usamos todas las flores para desaparecer la isla a tiempo.

translation.en: to make the whole island disappear before the boat went off.
translation.es: Usamos todas las flores para desaparecer la isla a tiempo.

translation.en: I was right about the flowers and the Cyclops.
translation.es: Sabía de las flores y los cíclopes.

translation.en: What else am I right about?
I'll just get back in that flower, and I'll keep trying again and again
translation.es: Volveré a la flor y lo intentaré una y otra vez

translation.en: It worked. Dr. Chung made it back!
You've been a very bad dog, Clarance.
translation.es: Has sido un perro muy malo, Clarance.

translation.en: - Beg. - ...you'll feel the wrath of my--
Oh, it's so good to see you and you, and you, and...
translation.es: Qué bueno verte a ti, a ti, a ti y…

translation.en: I think you should be asking when are--
Today, we celebrate the one- year anniversary
of the greatest discovery of the 21st century,
translation.es: del mayor hallazgo del siglo XXI.

translation.en: a species once thought extinct, flummels.
translation.es: Una especie que se creía extinta, los flummels.

translation.en: brought to us by famed botanical astrophysicist, Dr. Lee Chung.
translation.es: traídos a nosotros por el famoso botánico, el Dr. Lee Chung.

translation.en: A recent survey shows that the average...
Oh, I'm so proud of you, Lee.
And you've been so much more talkative since your discovery.
translation.es: Y hablas mucho más desde tu descubrimiento.

translation.en: Friend at the end again, eh? Nope.
translation.es: - Amigo del fondo otra vez. - No.

translation.en: Aww, and all without my help.
You and Dr. Chung visit any cool places lately?
translation.es: ¿Tú y el Dr. Chung han viajado?

translation.en: It's been one amazing adventure after another.
What did you guys end up doing with Clarance?  Oh, he's cooling off.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó con Clarance? - Se está calmando.

translation.en: No dog should have a master.
So, on the count of three,
I say we tie up Shackleton, take his ship, and head somewhere warm like Cabo.
translation.es: atamos a Shackleton, tomamos su barco y vamos a un lugar cálido como El Cabo.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. We can change it up.
They let dogs in the restaurants there.
Ready or not, Hoss, here I come.
translation.es: Listo o no, Hoss, aquí voy.

translation.en: And thanks for helping out, pals.
Well, how do you like this year's two flower floats?
translation.es: ¿Les gustan las dos carrozas de este año?

translation.en: - Great. - I look a little chunky.
I'm sorry your teeth are yellow. We ran out of white flowers.
translation.es: No nos alcanzó para hacerte dientes blancos.

translation.en: Hey, Ed, I have a little surprise for you. Come with me.
translation.es: Oye, Ed, tengo una sorpresa para ti. - Ven conmigo. - Adoro las sorpresas.

translation.en: Except I just remembered that I don't,
so tell me what it is so I'm not too surprised.
Don't worry, Ed. I'm sure you have plenty of time to prepare for--
translation.es: Tranquilo, Ed. Seguro tienes tiempo para…

translation.en: Op, I really don't know if I could handle another surprise today.
translation.es: Op, no sé si soportaré otra sorpresa hoy.

translation.en: Trust me. You're gonna love it.
Hey, I haven't seen you since, what, like 1835?
There's so much to talk about.
You two keep going. I'll go get him a glass of water.
translation.es: Sigan. Iré por un vaso de agua.
